sentence: Thursday's session closes with the NASDAQ Composite Index at 3,658.78.
The total shares traded for the NASDAQ was over 1.49 billion.
Advancers stocks led declining by 1.51 to 1 ratio.
There were 1511 advancers and 1002 decliners for the day.
On the NASDAQ Stock Exchange 58 stocks reached a 52 week high and 13 those reaching lows totaled.
The most active, advancers, decliners, unusual volume and most active by dollar volume can be monitored intraday on the Most Active Stocks page.
The NASDAQ 100 index closed up .17% for the day; a total of 5.4 points.
Randgold Resources Limited ( GOLD ) had the largest percent change down (-2.7%) while Sears Holdings Corporation ( SHLD ) had the largest percent change gain rising 6.27%.
The Dow Jones index closed up .04% for the day; a total of 6.61 points.
Home Depot, Inc. (The) ( HD ) had the largest percent change down (-1.55%) while UnitedHealth Group Incorporated ( UNH ) had the largest percent change gain rising .94%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
